mapper.insert: insert into document (documentnumber, title, preservation, presentdate, contents, tempsortation, completesortation, presentuser, presentdepartment,documentType) values (#{documentNumber},#{title},#{preservation},sysdate ,#{contents},#{tempSortation},#{completeSortation},#{presentUser},#{presentDepartment},#{documentType})
mapper.select: select documentnumber, title, preservation, presentdate, contents, tempsortation, completesortation, presentuser, presentdepartment,documentType from document
select documentnumber, title, preservation, presentdate, contents, tempsortation, completesortation, presentuser, presentdepartment from document where documentnumber = #{documentnumber}
